# Pagination Variants

This component supports the following appearances and variants. To apply them, use the corresponding class(es) on your widget.

---

## Appearance: Basic

**Appearance Class:** `app-datanavigator  pagination basic`

---

## Appearance: Pager

**Appearance Class:** `app-datanavigator  pager`

---

## Appearance: Advanced

**Appearance Class:** `app-datanavigator  pagination advanced`
